EmailTemplate.name: SIP Submission needed_1st reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: SIP {!SIP_Tickets__c.CreatedBy}, submit for approval
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!SIP_Tickets__c.CreatedBy}
You have created SIP ticket "{!SIP_Tickets__c.Name} " please remember to select ‘Submit for approval’. Your ticket is not submitted until you hit that button!
To go to the ticket please Click Here.
Thank you and have a great day -SIP Team
